title: BACnetLargeAnalogValue (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK PUBLIC BACnetLargeAnalogValue EXTENDS BACnetStaticObjectBase IMPLEMENTS IBACnetLargeAnalogValue
FB reflecting a BACnet-LargeAnalogValue-Object. All Properties of this FB give access to the client writeable BACnet-Properties of the
reflected BACnet-Object, although the access is done not client sided (without checking access restrictions).
Additionally see documentation of
BACnetObjectBase
.
